data.message: Hi facebook.my fiance account have been invaded by unknown personality and he has change the profile picture,password and everthing

replies.message: Hey there. If your fiancé can't get into their account because it was taken over by someone else, please tell them to go to the Hacked Accounts section at http://bit.ly/2h3LZ76 to get immediate help. You can also encourage them to visit Privacy Basics at http://bit.ly/2hv1zpl for tips and guides to help them keep their account secure. -Kiara
ok thanks but the number she use to create the account is not more with her,so what can she do then
